channel.title: Some Standard Stuff
channel.description: Hey i run a server with the "Ownage PK" source and its called mmopkscape.. I wanted to know how to change what it says at the top when im playing. And the logout screen and i want to know how to add a person saying "Runeblade912 is ONLINE\OFFLINE"[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 08:35:20 PM[/size][hr]Oh and also ::info and ::rules command :)

item.title: Some Standard Stuff
item.dc:creator: @dahornay dahornay
item.description:
@dahornay wrote:

runeblade912 if u want to change the name go into your client.java and search for:

 public void writePlayers() {

should look something like this:

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@whi@ Joshhorn573Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6572); sendFrame126("@cya@ killcount: " + killcount, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); }
change what is in the quotation marks to whatever u want it to say
hope it helps

Read full topic
